articles.title: Meetings Held to Congratulate Kim Jong Il on His Reelection as NDC Chairman
articles.content:
Meetings Held to Congratulate Kim Jong Il on His Reelection as NDC Chairman
Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held here today to warmly congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					The meeting of Pyongyangites was held at Kim Il Sung Square with the attendance of at least 100,000 citizens from all walks of life.
					
					 Attending it were senior party and state officials, the chairman of a friendly party and members of the NDC.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, said in his speech at the meeting that the reelection of Kim Jong Il as NDC chairman at the first session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly was an expression of absolute support and trust in him by the servicepersons and people of the DPRK and their unshakable faith and will to build a great prosperous and powerful nation on this land without fail and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun under his guidance, he said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il saved the destiny of the country and the nation from the moves for aggression and war on the part of the imperialists and the reactionaries, reliably defended the Korean-style socialist system and provided a strong war deterrent for self-defence by pursuing unique Songun politics, thus helping the DPRK turn into a military power that no one dares provoke.
					
					 It is necessary to steadily exert efforts for increasing the capacity of the People's Army, establish the trait of attaching importance to the army throughout the society and thoroughly implement the policy of putting all the people under arms and converting the whole country into a fortress true to the Songun revolutionary line of the WPK, thereby turning the whole country into an impregnable fortress and preventing aggressors from invading the inviolable territory of the country even an inch.
					
					ã€€An immensely rosy future is in store for the Party, the army and the people of the DPRK advancing toward the high eminence of the great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in sky-high spirit with redoubled courage under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speeches were made by the first vice-chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee and representatives of workers, agricultural workers and youth and students. 
					
					 A similar meeting of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces took place at the Jonsung Square.
					
					 Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, delivered a report to be followed by congratulatory speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers evinced their firm determination to strive harder for the development of the People's Army and a shining victory in the struggle for building a great prosperous powerful nation through high-pitched drive for bringing about a fresh revolutionary surge under the Party's Songun leadership with the great honor and pride of having Kim Jong Il as the top leader of the state.

articles.title: 26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Opens
articles.content:
26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Opens
Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The 26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival was opened with due ceremony here on Friday.
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the Cabinet, and others, officials concerned, working people and artistes in Pyongyang. 
					
					 It was also attended by foreign artistes, Korean artistes overseas and delegations of different countries, diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and various embassy officials here, foreign guests and overseas compatriots staying in the DPRK.
					
					 Minister of Culture Kang Nung Su, chairman of the organizing committee of the festival, delivered an opening address. 
					
					 He warmly welcomed foreign artistes and Korean artistes overseas who came here to participate in the 26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival taking place in Pyongyang at a significant time when the Korean people are commemorating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung as the greatest holiday of the nation.
					
					  He recalled that the festival has developed into a grand international gathering of the progressive artistes desirous of genuine culture and arts and a stage of friendship for boosting the cultural exchange and cooperation among countries generation after generation. 
					
					 Noting that the festival will provide artistes of different countries of the world with a meaningful occasion of swapping successes and experience gained in the creation of national arts and contributing to the development of human culture and arts, guided by the noble idea of independence, peace and friendship, he expressed the belief that the participants in the festival would achieve great successes in their performing activities. 
					
					 Bai Shuxiang, vice-president of the China Federation of Literature and Art Circles, and Boris Teblin, head of the State Academy Ensemble Named after Sveshnikov of Russia, made congratulatory speeches.
					
					 Then, Korean artistes in costumes of different countries presented graceful dances reflecting the ardent yearning and profound reverence of all people for Kim Il Sung to the tune of "Song of Mangyongdae".
					
					Seen on the background of the stage were scenes showing Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il watching performances given during the festivals and receiving artistes from different parts of the world who participated in the festivals.
					
					 A performance was given by Korean artistes at the opening ceremony.

articles.title: Preview of Feature Film Held
articles.content:
Preview of Feature Film Held
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The Korean April 25 Film Studio has recently produced feature film "The Great Bear".
					 The film deals with the struggle conducted by a scouting group codenamed "The Great Bear" during the Fatherland Liberation War. It depicts the transparent ideological and moral world of the servicepersons devotedly defending their leader.
					
					 The preview of the film took place at Taedongmun Cinema on Friday.
					
					 Attending there were senior party and state officials, the chairpersons of friendly parties, officials of ministries and national institutions, creators and artistes in the movie field and working people in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Useful Animals Protected
articles.content:
Useful Animals Protected
Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Work for protecting useful animals is getting brisk in the DPRK.
					Ushering in April, broad masses have been drawn into the creation of ecological environment favorable for the propagation of animals in the sanctuaries across the country.
					
					Relevant units are providing animals with good conditions for habitation by growing feed plants and hanging artificial nests on trees.
					
					Particular efforts are directed to the protection and propagation of animals in danger of extinction and rare animals.
					
					Supervision and control by the state are tightened: hunting and grazing in the sanctuaries and mine development, road building and all other projects in their surroundings are banned in this period.
					
					The Nature Conservation Union of Korea, in contact with mass media, is informing people of what they should abide by in the period and frequently organizing lectures, propaganda by means of visual aids, film shows, experience-swap meetings, etc.
					
					The period of protection of useful animals is from March to July in the DPRK.
					
					The state pays special attention to the protection of animals in this period.

articles.title: President's Reminiscences Read Widely
articles.content:
President's Reminiscences Read Widely
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Working people and school youth and children of the DPRK are reading with avidity the reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung with the approach of the significant Day of the Sun.
					 Ardent yearning and reverence for the President are read on the faces of those reading the reminiscences in the streets, villages, parks and all other places where spring has come to stay. 
					
					 The reminiscences of the President "With the Century" are the most favorite books of the working people and the school youth and children among so many books in the country.
					
					 They gain extensive and profound knowledge of the revolutionary history of the President through the study of the reminiscences, the library of his revolutionary history vividly describing it with immensely rich content and gem-like sentences. 
					
					 The reminiscences are written in humble words, but the readers feel with a surge of warmth in their hearts the immortal feats of the President in regaining the lost country, building in this land a socialist Korea independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defense in which the Juche idea is incorporated and devoting his whole life to the country and the people.
					
					 The books give an impressive and historic description of materials on the revolutionary activities of the President and stories of actual characters and events. They also expound the principle of revolution and depict the struggle and life, thus leaving deep impressions on the minds of the readers.
					
					 The readers learn the theory of revolution, the principle and ways of revolution and the noble spirit of loving the country, the nation, the people and revolutionary comrades through the reminiscences, the immortal encyclopedia of revolution containing the great revolutionary feats of the President and his noble traits as a great man.
					
					 The reminiscences that appeal more strongly to the hearts and minds of the people as the days go by with great influence and persuasive power are the eternal treasure of the Korean revolution, a monumental work which will always hold a special place in human history and a priceless textbook of revolution.

articles.title: Invincible WPK
articles.content:
Invincible WPK
Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- One of the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung in arranging the foundation for building a rich and powerful country is that he had developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an invincible one.
					 Under the leadership of the President, the WPK, the organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people, has set an example in carving out a new way of building a revolutionary party suitable to the era of independence.
					
					 He, with the belief that the internal force of the revolution is popular masses, set forth in his early years a policy of founding a party by the method of organizing basic party organizations rooted deep among broad sections of masses including workers and peasants first of all and then expanding and strengthening them. And he had guided wisely the efforts for its implementation.
					
					 After the foundation of the WPK, he had led it so as to decisively smash the pressure by the modern revisionists and great-power chauvinists and firmly maintain the Juche stand and independent line in the party building and activities including its organizational, ideological and leadership art construction. As a result, it has steadily emerged victorious even under the grave situation in which socialism collapsed in various socialist countries.
					
					 It is a brilliant fruition of the President's wise leadership that the WPK has developed into a steel-like one which is imbued with the Juche idea and, on its basis, is firmly united ideologically and purposefully, a revolutionary one all the organizations and members of which act as one under the monolithic guidance of the leader.
					
					 He not only founded the WPK and strengthened as invincible one, but also firmly established the organizational and ideological base and the leadership system in the Party for carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 As he had laid a solid foundation for bringing the Party's cause to a brilliant accomplishment, the WPK could be steeled further in the past ten-odd-year long struggle for safeguarding the sovereignty of the nation and opening up the road of new advance for the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation; and it could demonstrate its high authority and dignity as the general staff of the revolution and the vanguard of anti-imperialism and independence which enjoys absolute support of the people.
					
					 The great exploit made by the President in developing the WPK into the unbreakable one leading the era of independence will shine long in the annals of the nation.

articles.title: Foreign Marathoners Here
articles.content:
Foreign Marathoners Here
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Chinese and Ethiopian marathoners came here today to participate in the IAAF-22nd Mangyongdae Prize Marathon Race to be held on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Earlier, arriving were marathoners from South Africa, Zimbabwe, Botswana, Kenya and Namibia.

articles.title: Account of First Session of 12th SPA Featured by Press
articles.content:
Account of First Session of 12th SPA Featured by Press
Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers Friday each devote much space to special write-ups interwoven with articles on the First Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly. Figuring large in the press are a portrait of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, a picture showing the platform party of the session attended by him and the news that it elected him chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Papers carry a speech made by deputy Kim Yong Nam in which he presented to the session of the SPA the proposal of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the WPK Central Military Commission to elect Kim Jong Il chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and an opening address. 
					
					 The press informs the readers of the members of the state leadership body elected by the First Session of the 12th SPA and carries photographs of the president of the Presidium of the SPA of the DPRK, the premier of the Cabinet, the honorary vice-president and vice-presidents of the Presidium of the SPA and the first vice-chairman, vice-chairmen and members of the NDC. 
					
					 Seen in the press are the text of an oath made by the premier of the Cabinet before deputies to the SPA, a report of the Deputy Credentials Committee of the 12th SPA, a report on the results of the implementation of the state budget for Juche 97 (2008)" and the state budget for Juche 98 (2009)" and speeches made at the session. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the press conveys news that dancing parties of youth and students were held across the country to celebrate the 16th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Kimilsungia Greenhouse was opened in Guinea and a meeting and a book and photo exhibition took place in Russia on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun edits song "We Are Translating Leader's Intention into Reality."
					
					 The paper carries articles introducing the feats scientists and technicians have performed by succeeding in launching the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2.

articles.title: Successful Satellite Launch Hailed
articles.content:
Successful Satellite Launch Hailed
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification made public a statement on April 5 hailing the successful satellite launch in the DPRK.
					 The statement said that the DPRK successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong-2, fully demonstrating the might of science and technology as a leading satellite launcher before the whole world.
					
					 It stressed that no matter how vociferously the U.S., Japan and the Lee Myung Bak dictatorial regime may grumble about "violation of the UN resolution" and cry out for "sanctions" they cannot misrepresent the satellite as a missile nor can they make the DPRK's  independent line of building a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012  go off its track. 
					
					 The imperialists' increasing threat of a nuclear war would only compel the DPRK to reinforce its counter-action and make Korean-style socialism more vital and give further momentum to the spirit of independence against imperialism and self-reliance, the statement noted.
					
					 It urged the U.S., Japan and the Lee dictatorial regime to immediately stop all hostile activities over the issue of the DPRK's launch of the satellite for peaceful purposes and opt for building a peace-keeping mechanism and contributing to the implementation of the south-north joint declarations.

articles.title: Disorganization of Conservative Group of Gangsters Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Disorganization of Conservative Group of Gangsters Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) released a statement titled "Lee Myung Bak regime should disorganize a political gangster group at once" on Apr. 7.
					 The statement accused the ultra-right conservative forces of organizing a terrorist group called "patriotic riot group" some days ago.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that this group openly cried out for "violence" and "terrorism" under the watchword of "eliminating the leftist forces of society," but the Lee regime shut its eyes to this rowdyism, the statement deplored. 
					
					The Lee regime is set to intensify the suppression of the progressive forces even by mobilizing gangsters, not content with the involvement of repressive forces including police and prosecution.
					
					 The Lee regime should clearly remember what a miserable end dictator Syngman Rhee met while cracking down upon the people desirous of democracy and reunification by mobilizing such white terrorist group as the "Northwest Young People's Association," it warned, demanding the authorities disband the conservative group of gangsters at once.

articles.title: British Organizations Hail DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch
articles.content:
British Organizations Hail DPRK's Successful Satellite Launcha
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on Apr. 5 hailing the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2.
					 Warmly congratulating the DPRK on the successful launch of the satellite, the statement stressed that it is a spectacular success of the DPRK and represents a victory of Juche-based science and technology. 
					
					 The DPRK has the inviolable right to develop space for peaceful purposes, the statement noted, adding that its successful launch of satellite serves as a great event heralding a prelude to the emergence of a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.

articles.title: Struggle for Korea's Reunification Supported in Mexico
articles.content:
Struggle for Korea's Reunification Supported in Mexico
Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Eight political parties and organizations of Mexico, including the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the Socialist Party of Mexico, the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, released a joint statement on Apr. 3 on the occasion of the 16th publication anniversary of the 10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country.
					 The statement said that the 10-point programme carrying President Kim Il Sung's noble patriotic idea that the gate to national reunification should be opened by the united efforts of the whole nation is the immortal great programme which ushered in the historic June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and south of Korea and overseas will solve all the problems in the idea of "By our nation itself" on the basis of the three charters for national reunification formulated by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, it stressed.
					
					 The statement bitterly slashed at the joint military exercises recently staged by the U.S. and south Korea against the DPRK with mobilization of huge armed forces and condemned traitor Lee Myung Bak for totally denying the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration and pursuing the policy of sycophancy toward the U.S., anti-reunification and confrontation with the DPRK while going against the trend of the times toward reunification.
					
					 It demanded that the new administration of the U.S put an end to the anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK and provide an international environment favorable for Korea's reunification.
					
					 The statement called upon all the political parties, governments and organizations in the world hoping for peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and the reunification of Korea to inspiringly encourage the WPK and the Korean people in the struggle to realize the cause of independent reunification of the country according to the 10-point programme.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated in Mexico
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated in Mexico
Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Mexican organizations released bulletins carrying the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung to commemorate the anniversary of his birth.
					 The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea said, in an article titled "Life of Great Man Seen with Numbers" carried in the 33rd issue of its bulletin, that the whole life of Kim Il Sung is a history of great devotion as he built a country for the people and dedicated his all to the building of a powerful socialist nation.
					
					The President gave field guidance to more than 20,600 units across the country from the very day of Korea's liberation to early July of 1994, and the total length of his journey for guidance was over 578,000 kms, the bulletin noted.
					
					The bulletin cited data to inform that the President authored over 10,800 works, met with a total of at least 70,000 foreign personages and received honorary titles, orders, medals, gifts, etc. from many countries.
					
					 The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, in an article entitled "Model of Internationalism" carried in its bulletin on April 2, noted that the President strengthened unity and solidarity with peoples of many countries advancing under the banner of independence and rendered material and moral support to their struggle and clearly indicated the ways for realizing the cause of global independence through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities until the last moments of his life since he embarked on the road of revolution.
					
					 The President who set a model of noble internationalism will live forever with the progressive humankind vigorously advancing toward an independent world, the bulletin stressed.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed
Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Ukraine, India and Bangladesh between March 29 and 31 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at the venues of seminars were his works and books and photos showing his exploits.
					
					 Nikolai Polishk, chairman of the National Coordinating Committee of the Ukrainian Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Association for the Study of Songun Policy, said that the greatest exploit of Kim Il Sung for humankind is that he founded the immortal Juche idea and provided a sure guarantee for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					Sadhna Harish, chairwoman of the Indian Study Group of Songun Politics, noted that General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the sun of the 21st century, has successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by Kim Il Sung. It is thanks to his Songun politics that the DPRK is unshakably advancing along the road chosen by itself despite the harsh situation of the world, she added.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, said that Kim Il Sung built the strongest bulwark of independence in the world.
					
					 He underscored the need to learn the greatness of Kim Jong Il and the working spirit of the Korean people to contribute to realizing the cause of global independence.
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the seminars in Ukraine and India.

articles.title: Inaugurado XXVI Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera
articles.content:
Inaugurado XXVI Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera
 Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurado el dia 10 en esta capital el XXVI Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera.
					  En el acto inaugural participaron el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, el secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, el vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros, Ro Tu Chol, los funcionarios correspondientes, los trabajadores capitalinos, los artistas nacionales y extranjeros, los artistas coreanos residentes en ultramar, las delegaciones de varios paises, los representantes diplomaticos y los delegados de las organizaciones internacionales, los miembros de las embajadas de varios paises, acreditados en Corea, los huespedes extranjeros y los coreanos en ultramar.
					
					  La palabra inaugural estuvo a cargo del ministro de Cultura Kang Nung Su, presidente del comite organizador del festival.
					
					  Kang dio calida bienvenida a los artistas extranjeros y los artistas coreanos en ultramar quienes participan en la 26a edicion del festival, que tiene lugar en Pyongyang, en el tiempo significativo en que el pueblo coreano conmemora el dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung como fiesta nacional mas grande.
					
					  Senalo que este evento vino desarrollandose de siglo en siglo como gran cita artistica de dimension internacional de los artistas progresistas, que aspiran a la verdadera cultura y arte, y como escena de amistad que intensifica el intercambio y la cooperacion en el area cultural entre los paises.
					
					 Subrayo que esta edicion sera una oportunidad importante para que los artistas de varios paises del mundo contribuyan, bajo el noble ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad, al desarrollo cultural y artistico de la humanidad intercambiando los exitos y experiencias alcanzadas en la creacion del arte nacional.
					
					 Expreso la conviccion de que los participantes lograran grtandes exitos en sus funciones artisticas.
					
					  La vicepresidenta de la Federacion del Circulo Literario y Artistico de China Bai Shuxiang y el jefe del Coro Academico Nacional Sveshnikov de Rusia, Boris Teblin, pronunciaron las palabras congratulatorias.
					
					  Acto seguido, al compas de la melodia de la "Cancion de Mangyongdae", los artistas coreanos en vestimentas tipicas de varios paises mostraron elegantes movimientos coreograficos que traducen la infinita veneracion y anoranza de toda la humanidad al Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					  En el fondo de la escena se proyectaron las imagenes del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presenciando las funciones del mismo festival y encontrandose con los artistas de los 5 continentes del mundo participantes.
					
					  En la ocasion hubo la funcion de los artistas coreanos.

articles.title: Capitalinos felicitan la eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente de CDN
articles.content:
Capitalinos felicitan la eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente de CDN
Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar solemnemente el dia 10 en esta capital los mitines para felicitar calidamente la eleccion del Dirigente    Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En el solemne acto de mas de cien mil capitalinos de distintos sectores efectuado en la Plaza Kim Il Sung estuvieron presentes los cuadros del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo y los miembros del CDN.
					
					  Al hacer uso de la palabra, el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea Kim Ki Nam senalo que el hecho de que el Dirigente       Kim Jong Il fue elegido como Presidente del CDN de la RPDC en el primer periodo de sesiones de la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema es la expresion del apoyo y confianza absolutos en el del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea y la manifestacion de la firme conviccion y voluntad de ellos de edificar sin falta en la tierra patria la gran potencia prospera y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Songun (priorizacion militar) bajo la direccion del Dirigente. 
					
					 El Dirigente salvo el destino del pais y la nacion desde las maniobras de agresion y guerra de los imperialistas y otros reaccionarios, defendio firmemente el sistema socialista al estilo coreano y preparo el poderoso disuasivo de guerra de caracter autodefensivo practicando su original politica de Songun.
					
					 De esta manera, mostro plenamente el gallardo aspecto de la RPDC como intocable potencia militar de talla mundial.
					
					  Es preciso seguir destinando grandes fuerzas al fortalecimiento del Ejercito Popular de Corea manteniendo la linea de la revolucion del Songun del partido e implantar en toda la sociedad el clima de dar importancia a los asuntos militares.
					
					 Hay que convertir todo el pais en una fortaleza inexpugnable al seguir materializando consecuentemente la orientacion de armamento de todo el pueblo y la fortificacion de todo el pais para que ningun agresor pueda invadir ni una pulgada de nuestro sagrado territorio patrio.
					
					  Les espera un maravilloso futuro al partido, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que avanzan con coraje e impetu redoblados hacia la cima de la gran potencia prospera socialista siguiendo la guia del Dirigente.
					
					  Acto seguido, intervinieron el primer vicepresidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang, los delegados de los obreros, los trabajadores agricolas, los jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					  Por otra parte, en el mitin de festejo del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, efectuado en la Plaza Jonsung, hubo el informe del ministro de las FAP Kim Yong Chun e intervenciones de felicitacion.
					
					  Los oradores expresaron sus firmes decisiones de luchar energicamente por el fortalecimiento del ejercito popular y la victoria brillante en la gran batalla de construccion de la gran potencia prospera registrando un nuevo y gran auge revolucionario bajo la direccion del Songun del partido con el gran honor y orgullo de enaltecer al Comandante Supremo del EPC en el puesto supremo del Estado.    -0-

articles.title: Invencible Partido del Trabajo de Corea
articles.content:
Invencible Partido del Trabajo de Corea
Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ATCC) -- La inmortal hazana del Presidente Kim Il Sung en la preparacion de la eterna base de la construccion de la patria prospera es que el fortalecio el Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC) como invencible agrupacion que encauza la epoca de independencia.
					  El PTC, organizador y orientador de todas las victorias del pueblo coreano, creo bajo la direccion del Presidente el brillante ejemplo de como allanar el nuevo camino de la construccion de un partido revolucionario en la epoca de independencia.
					
					  Hace mucho tiempo, partiendo de su firme conviccion de que el sujeto de la revolucion es las masas populares, presento la orientacion de fundar el partido consistente en organizar primero la entidad partidista de base arraigada profundamente en amplias masas como los obreros y campesinos y ampliarla y fortalecerla despues y condujo sabiamente la lucha por realizarla.
					
					 El Presidente hizo mantener firmemente la posicion autoctona y la linea independiente en la construccion y las actividades del partido, incluyendo la construccion organizativa e ideologica y la creacion de metodos de direccion, frustrando tajantemente la presion de los revisionistas contemporaneos y chovinistas de grandes potencias.
					
					 Gracias a tal direccion de su fundador, el PTC pudo marchar siempre victorioso desde su fundacion aun bajo las severas circunstancias como el derrumbe del socialismo en varios paises.
					
					  El PTC se hizo el partido de acero que realizo la identificacion de todas sus filas segun la idea Juche y la unidad monolitica ideo-volitiva y se desarrollo como agrupacion revolucionaria en que todas las organizaciones y militantes se mueven como un solo hombre bajo la direccion unica del lider, lo cual es brillante resultado de la sabia direccion del Presidente. 
					
					  Tambien, el Presidente establecio firmemente la base organizativa e ideologica y el sistema de direccion, necesarios para llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					  Por consiguiente, el PTC se torno mas fuerte en la ardua lucha de mas de 10 anos pasados por defender la soberania del pais y la nacion y abrir el camino de avance de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera y adquirio el alto prestigio y dignidad como Estado Mayor de la revolucion y vanguardia de la independencia antiimperialista, apoyado absolutamente por el pueblo.
					
					  Esta gran hazana del Presidente sera registrada para siempre en los anales de la patria.

articles.title: Editados en Mexico boletines por el Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Editados en Mexico boletines por el Dia del Sol
Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del cumpleanos (15 de abril) del Presidente Kim Il Sung, las entidades mexicanas dieron a luz los boletines conmemorativos adjuntando el retrato de el con amplia sonrisa.
					  En el articulo intitulado "La vida del gran hombre vista con cifras", publicado en su boletin No. 33, el Instituto de la Idea Juche de Mexico elogio que la vida del Presidente Kim Il Sung es la historia de gran abnegacion en que el dedico todo lo suyo para construir el pais del pueblo y la potencia socialista.
					
					  El boletin senala que desde la liberacion de Corea (en agosto de 1945) hasta principios de julio de 1994, el Presidente dirigio sobre el terreno mas de 20 mil 600 unidades en distintas localidades del pais recorriendo una trayectoria que totaliza mas de 578 mil km.
					
					  Y presento con datos concretos que el escribio mas de 10 mil 800 obras, recibio en audiencia a mas de 70 mil huespedes extranjeros y recibio los titulos honorarios, las ordenes, las medallas y los regalos de numerosos paises.
					
					 Por otra parte, el Comite Mexicano para el Estudio del Kimilsunismo publico en su boletin fechado 2 el articulo "Paradigma del internacionalismo".
					
					 Este articulo refiere que desde el inicio de sus actividades revolucionarias hasta el periodo final de su vida, el Presidente fortalecio la unidad y la solidaridad con los pueblos de numerosos paises del mundo, que avanzan bajo la bandera de la independencia, apoyo en lo material y espiritual la lucha de ellos e ilumino claramente el camino a seguir por la causa de la independencia en el mundo mediante sus entusiastas actividades ideo-teoricas.
					
					  Destaca que el Presidente Kim Il Sung quien creo el noble paradigma del internacionalismo vivira siempre junto con la humanidad progresista que avanza a pasos firmes hacia el mundo independizado.
